content:
Hello all! I'm looking at the feasibility of implementing product using CDS Hooks and am trying to assess current availability in major EHRs. I was pointed to this: https://github.com/argonautproject/cds-hooks/wiki/Readiness-and-Testing-Matrix but it's pretty out of date (and Argonaut based).

Does anyone have a more current view of the world?

Thanks @Chris Grenz for pointing this out! I'd love to establish a more up-to-date view of current CDS Hooks support status in the https://github.com/cds-hooks/docs/wiki wiki, right next to our "proposed hooks" section. Chris, are you willing to set up the scaffold for this?
Might be better detail to include, so feel free to add/change!

Awesome! Folks here who might be able to fill in details at https://github.com/cds-hooks/docs/wiki/CDS-Hooks-Availability include @Isaac Vetter @Dennis Patterson @brian doolittle @Kyle MacLennan @Jeffrey Danford
